Song.title: The Glories Of Calvary
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Steve and Vikki Cook © 2003 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Chorus: My heart is [E]filled with a thousand [B]songs Proclaiming the [C#m7]glories of Calvar[A]y With every [E]breath, Lord how I [B]long To sing of [C#m7]Jesus who died for [A]me Lord, take me [F#m9 Amaj7]deeper into the [C#m]glor[B]ies of Calvar[ E | B | F#m | A]y
Verse 2: Sinners [E]find eternal [B]joy In the [F#m]triumph of Your [A]wounds By our [E]Savior’s crimson [B]flow Holy [F#m]wrath has been rem[A]oved And Your [E]saints bel[B]ow Join with your [F#m9]saints ab[A]ove Rej[C#m]oicing [G#]in the Risen [A | A]Lamb
Trans Chorus: My heart is [E]filled with a thousand [B]songs Proclaiming the [C#m7]glories of Calvar[A]y With every [E]breath, Lord how I [B]long To sing of [C#m7]Jesus who died for [A]me Lord, take me [F#m9 Amaj7]deeper into the [C#m]glor[B]ies Lord, take me [F#m9 Amaj7]deeper into the [C#m]glor[B]ies Lord, take me [F#m9 Amaj7]deeper into the [C#m]glor[B]ies of Calvar[A | D | Bm | E :||]y
Glorious: You are [A]glorio[Esus]us, [E] [Dmaj7]glorio[Bm7]us And [A]we will lift our vo[Esus]ic[E]es to w[A]orship You [Esus] [E]You are [A]glorio[Esus]us, [E] [Dmaj7]glori[Bm7]ous And [A]we will always be[E] [ ]in [D2]awe of You [Bm7]
Arrangement.searchtext: chorus my heart is filled with a thousand songs proclaiming the glories of calvary with every breath lord how i long to sing of jesus who died for me lord take me deeper into the glories of calvary verse 2 sinners find eternal joy in the triumph of your wounds by our saviors crimson flow holy wrath has been removed and your saints below join with your saints above rejoicing in the risen lamb trans chorus my heart is filled with a thousand songs proclaiming the glories of calvary with every breath lord how i long to sing of jesus who died for me lord take me deeper into the glories lord take me deeper into the glories lord take me deeper into the glories of calvary glorious you are glorious glorious and we will lift our voices to worship you you are glorious glorious and we will always be in awe of you

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Lord, You’re [E]calling me to [B]come And beh[F#m]old the wondrous [A]cross To expl[E]ore the depths of [B]grace That came to [F#m]me at such a [A]cost Where Your [E]boundless [B]love Conquered my [F#m9]boundless [A]sin And [C#m]mercy’s [G#]arms were opened [A | A]wide
Chorus: Lord, fill my [E]heart with a thousand [B]songs Proclaiming the [C#m7]glories of Calvar[A]y With every [E]breath, Lord help me [B]long To sing of [C#m7]Jesus who died for [A]me Lord, take me [F#m9 Amaj7]deeper Into the [C#m]glor[B]ies of Calvar[Esus4 E | B Bsus4 B | F#m F#m9 F#m7 | A]y
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 lord youre calling me to come and behold the wondrous cross to explore the depths of grace that came to me at such a cost where your boundless love conquered my boundless sin and mercys arms were opened wide chorus lord fill my heart with a thousand songs proclaiming the glories of calvary with every breath lord help me long to sing of jesus who died for me lord take me deeper into the glories of calvary

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [Esus4 E | B Bsus4 B | F#m F#m9 F#m7 | Amaj7 A6 A]
Verse 1: Lord, You’re [E]calling me to [B]come And beh[F#m]old the wondrous [A]cross To expl[E]ore the depths of [B]grace That came to [F#m]me at such a [A]cost Where Your [E]boundless [B]love Conquered my [F#m9]boundless [A]sin And [C#m]mercy’s [G#]arms were opened [A | A]wide
Chorus: My heart is [E]filled with a thousand [B]songs Proclaiming the [C#m7]glories of Calvar[A]y With every [E]breath, Lord how I [B]long To sing of [C#m7]Jesus who died for [A]me Lord, take me [F#m9 Amaj7]deeper Into the [C#m]glor[B]ies of Calvar[Esus4 E | B Bsus4 B | F#m F#m9 F#m7 | A]y
Verse 2: Sinners [E]find eternal [B]joy In the [F#m]triumph of Your [A]wounds By our [E]Savior’s crimson [B]flow Holy [F#m]wrath has been rem[A]oved And Your [E]saints bel[B]ow Join with your [F#m9]saints ab[A]ove Rej[C#m]oicing [G#]in the Risen [A | A]Lamb
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 lord youre calling me to come and behold the wondrous cross to explore the depths of grace that came to me at such a cost where your boundless love conquered my boundless sin and mercys arms were opened wide chorus my heart is filled with a thousand songs proclaiming the glories of calvary with every breath lord how i long to sing of jesus who died for me lord take me deeper into the glories of calvary verse 2 sinners find eternal joy in the triumph of your wounds by our saviors crimson flow holy wrath has been removed and your saints below join with your saints above rejoicing in the risen lamb
